mapper.sql: sys_cash_back_id, sys_cash_back_no, threshold_min_value, threshold_max_value, cash_per, status, level, start_date, end_date, created_date, updated_date

a.sys_cash_back_id, a.sys_cash_back_no as sys_cash_back_no, concat(a.threshold_min_value, '<金额≤', a.threshold_max_value) as threshold_min_value, a.threshold_max_value, a.cash_per, a.status, a.level, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.created_date, a.updated_date
mapper.select: select sys_cash_back_id from sys_cash_back where sys_cash_back_id like CONCAT(#{sys_cash_back_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by sys_cash_back_id desc limit 1
select from sys_cash_back where sys_cash_back_no = #{0} and level = #{1} order by sys_cash_back_id desc limit 1
mapper.delete: delete from sys_cash_back where sys_cash_back_no = #{0} and level = #{1}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_cash_back (sys_cash_back_id, sys_cash_back_no, threshold_min_value, threshold_max_value, cash_per, status, level, start_date, end_date, created_date, updated_date) values (#{sys_cash_back_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sys_cash_back_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{threshold_min_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{threshold_max_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cash_per,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{created_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sys_cash_back
sys_cash_back_id,
threshold_min_value,
threshold_max_value,
cash_per,
status,
level,
start_date,
end_date,
created_date,
updated_date,

mapper.update:
update sys_cash_back
threshold_min_value = #{threshold_min_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
threshold_max_value = #{threshold_max_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cash_per = #{cash_per,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_date = #{created_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_date = #{updated_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sys_cash_back_id = #{sys_cash_back_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_cash_back set threshold_min_value = #{threshold_min_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, threshold_max_value = #{threshold_max_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_per = #{cash_per,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{start_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{end_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_date = #{created_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_date = #{updated_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sys_cash_back_id = #{sys_cash_back_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
